[Groovy] Class MongoDbDataStoreSpringInitializer

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.gorm.bootstrap.AbstractDatastoreInitializer
      grails.mongodb.bootstrap.MongoDbDataStoreSpringInitializer

class MongoDbDataStoreSpringInitializer
extends AbstractDatastoreInitializer

Used to initialize GORM for MongoDB outside of Grails

Graeme Rocher
Since:
